text: Lori Alan is an American actress and voice actress. She has played a long- running role as Pearl Krabs in SpongeBob SquarePants. She also voiced Diane Simmons in Family Guy, the Invisible Woman on Fantastic Four and The Boss in the Metal Gear series. == Other websites == * Category:1966 births Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Maryland Category:Living people
title: Lori Alan
